page.title: 17Home Life - a school girl
page.content: My name is{Amanda Flatt,}I am{12 {years old}and I live at 8 School Road, {Fritton.}There are four members in our family, my mother, father and my brother who is 13. When I am not at school I get up at various times between 9.00am and 10.00am. When I get up I have a cup of tea and some breakfast. At 11.00 I accompany my father to a local shop. When we get back we have dinner, then we sometimes go out to the nearby town of{Diss}or we go out for pleasure to a zoo, a nearby Otter Trust or a park. After arriving back home we have tea between 4.30 and 5.00. Then after tea we watch the television. Normally we go to bed at 10.00, but sometimes we watch a late night horror film, going to bed later at about 12.30am after the film.
